short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check your AWS Account unused services

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Check your AWS Account unused services" extension provides a convenient way to identify and manage unused services within your Amazon Web Services (AWS) account.

By clicking on the extension icon, a popup window will appear with a single button labeled "Open Website." Upon clicking this button, the extension will open a new tab with the URL leading to the AWS unused services checking tool.

This tool, hosted on "https://tools.cloudkaramchari.com/Find-AWS-unused-services/," helps you analyze your AWS resources and identify any services that are currently not being utilized. It can assist in optimizing your AWS account, reducing costs, and improving resource allocation.

With the "Check your AWS Account unused services" extension, you can easily stay on top of your AWS resources and ensure that you are efficiently utilizing the services you pay for.
